type.name: org.gradle.nativeplatform.platform.Architecture
type.description:
A cpu architecture.
Instruction Set 32-bit names 64-bit names
Intel x86 "x86", "i386", "ia-32", "i686" "x86_64", "amd64", "x64", "x86-64"
Intel Itanium N/A "ia-64", "ia64"
Power PC "ppc" "ppc64"
Sparc "sparc", "sparc32", "sparc-v8" "sparc64", "ultrasparc", "sparc-v9"
ARM "arm", "arm-v7", "armv7", "arm32" "arm64", "arm-v8"

method.name: getDisplayName
method.description: Returns a human-consumable display name for this architecture.

property.name: displayName
property.description: Returns a human-consumable display name for this architecture.
